list.Description: The School Bus entity, including only information that is of specific interest to the School Bus inspector and not tracked in other systems such as ICBC or NSC
list.Name: SchoolBus

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The ICBC Registration number for the School Bus
list.Name: regi

list.Description: The ICBC Plate Number for the School Bus
list.Name: plate

list.Description: The VIN for the School Bus
list.Name: VIN

list.Description: The (generated) permit number for the School Bus. This will be added by the Inspector before the School Bus Permit can be printed and the bus can go into service.
list.Name: permitNumber

list.Description: Enumerated type of Status - Inactive,  Active,  Archived
list.Name: status

list.Description: Address 1 of physical location of the School Bus.
list.Name: homeTerminalAddr1

list.Description: Address 2 of physical location of the School Bus.
list.Name: homeTerminalAddr2

list.Description: City of physical location of the School Bus.
list.Name: homeTerminalCity

list.Description: Province of physical location of the School Bus - free form.
list.Name: homeTerminalProvince

list.Description: Postal Code of physical location of the School Bus.
list.Name: homeTerminalPostalCode

list.Description: A comment about the physical location of the bus so that the Inspector can more easily find it for an inspection
list.Name: homeTerminalComment

list.Description: Text of any restrictions to be printed on the school bus permit.
list.Name: restrictions

list.Description: The next inspection date for this School Bus. Set at the time an inspection is set.
list.Name: nextInspectionDate

list.Description: An enumerated type (by the UI) to indicate the type of the next inspection - Annual or Re-inspection based on the Pass/Fail status of the most recent inspection.
list.Name: nextInspectionType

list.Description: The School District in which the School Bus operates. The school bus may or may not be associated with the School District itself - we just track where it is regardless.
list.Name: schoolBusDistrict

list.Description: True if the School Bus is associated with an Independent School. If true,  the name of the Independent School should be in the companion field.
list.Name: isIndependentSchool

list.Description: The name of the Independent School to which the School Bus is associated. Should be null if the companion isIndependentSchool is false.
list.Name: nameOfIndependentSchool

list.Description: The enumerated class of School Bus.
list.Name: schoolBusClass

list.Description: The enumerated body type of the School Bus.
list.Name: schoolBusBodyType

list.Description: The enumerated body type of the School Bus.
list.Name: schoolBusBodyTypeOther

list.Description: The unit number of the Bus as defined by the School Bus owner - freeform text.
list.Name: schoolBusUnitNumber

list.Description: The maximum number of passengers in the bus based on the specific use of the bus. For example,  the same 2-per seat / 24-passenger model might have a seating capacity of 36 if the specific bus is to be used for small children,  3 per seat.
list.Name: schoolBusSeatingCapacity

list.Description: The number of mobility aid passenger seats in the bus.
list.Name: mobilityAidCapacity

list.Description: The inspector assigned to this schoolbus
list.Name: inspector

list.Description: Notes entered by users about a specific School Bus.
list.Name: SchoolBusNote

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The contents of the note.
list.Name: note

list.Description: A user set flag that the note is no longer relevant. Allows the note to be retained for historical reasons,  but identified to the user as no longer relevant.
list.Name: isNoLongerRelevant

list.Description: Attachments uploaded by users about a specific School Bus. Attachments are stored in the file system, with rows in this table pointing to the file system location of the attachment.
list.Name: SchoolBusAttachment

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The physical location of the attachment on the file system.
list.Name: internalFileName

list.Description: The name of the attachment as defined by the user in uploading the document.
list.Name: externalFileName

list.Description: A note about the attachment,  optionally maintained by the user.
list.Name: description

list.Description: The history of updates made to a School Bus. Exact format of the history TBD.
list.Name: SchoolBusHistory

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the School Bus owner as defined by the user/Inspector. Not tied to the ICBC or NSC names,  but whatever is most useful for the Inspectors.
list.Name: name

list.Description: Status of the School Bus owner - enumerated value Active,  Archived
list.Name: status

list.Description: The date-time of the creation of the record from the audit fields. Since this might be surfaced in the API,  adding it to the definition.
list.Name: dateCreated

list.Description: Link to the designated Primary Contact for the Inspector to the School Bus Owner organization.
list.Name: primaryContact

list.Description: The District to which this School Bus is affliated.
list.Name: serviceArea

list.Description: The calculated next inspection date from across the School Buses associated with this School Bus Owner
list.Name: nextInspectionDate

list.Description: The calculated count of the number of School Buses associated with this School Bus Owner
list.Name: numberOfBuses

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The physical location of the attachment on the file system.
list.Name: internalFileName

list.Description: The name of the attachment as defined by the user in uploading the document.
list.Name: externalFileName

list.Description: A note about the attachment,  optionally maintained by the user.
list.Name: description

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: A user set flag that the note is no longer relevant. Allows the note to be retained for historical reasons,  but identified to the user as no longer relevant.
list.Name: isNoLongerRelevant

list.Description: The contents of the note.
list.Name: note

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The given name of the contact.
list.Name: givenName

list.Description: The surname of the contact.
list.Name: surname

list.Description: The role of the contact. UI controlled as to whether it is free form or selected from an enumerated list.
list.Name: role

list.Description: Notes about the contact.
list.Name: notes

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The type of the phone number. UI controlled as to whether it is free form or selected from an enumerated list.
list.Name: type

list.Description: The phone number of the contact. Entered as free form to support a range of formats.
list.Name: phoneNumber

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The type of the address. UI controlled as to whether it is free form or selected from an enumerated list.
list.Name: type

list.Description: Address 1 line of the address.
list.Name: addr1

list.Description: Address 2 line of the address.
list.Name: addr2

list.Description: The City of the address.
list.Name: city

list.Description: The Province of the address.
list.Name: province

list.Description: The postal code of the address.
list.Name: postalCode

list.Description: The history of updates made to a School Bus Owner record. Exact format of the history TBD.
list.Name: SchoolBusOwnerHistory

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Data pulled in from external sources (ICBC, NSC, etc) about School Buses and retained but not updated in the School Bus app. All data elements are simply copied from the comparable fields in the WSDLs of the Web Service Calls.
list.Name: CCWData

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Registration Number (Regi) is the link between the CCW information and a specific School Bus
list.Name: ICBCRegi

list.Description: Vehicle Year
list.Name: ICBCModelYear

list.Description: Primary Key make this match the Inspection Details page
list.Name: id

list.Description: Defaults for a new inspection to the current user,  but can be changed as needed.
list.Name: inspector

list.Description: The date the inspection was conducted.
list.Name: inspectionDate

list.Description: The type of the inspection - enumerated type of Annual or Re-inspection,  pulled from the School Bus record at the time the inspection record is created
list.Name: inspectionType

list.Description: The result of the inspection - enumerated type of Passed or Failed. The detailed results of the inspection are in RIP and not duplicated here.
list.Name: inspectionResult

list.Description: A note about the inspection independent of what goes into the RIP inspection - this is just for the School Bus application.
list.Name: notes

list.Description: The Restrictions text from the School Bus record. This is visible on the Inspections screen as a convenience for adjusting it prior to printing the Permit Page.
list.Name: restrictions

list.Description: The ID of the RIP inspection. The expectation is that the user will manually enter a RIP ID such that an external URL can be formed to allow the user to open the RIP inspection and see the inspection details.
list.Name: RIPInspectionId

list.Description: Record creation date
list.Name: createdDate

list.Description: User specific settings for a specific location in the UI. The location and saved settings are internally defined by the UI.
list.Name: UserFavourite

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The type of Favourite
list.Name: type

list.Description: The user-defined name for the recorded settings. Allows the user to save different groups of settings and access each one easily when needed.
list.Name: name

list.Description: The settings saved by the user. In general,  a UI defined chunk of json that stores the settings in place when the user created the favourite.
list.Name: value

list.Description: True if this Favourite is the default for this Context Type. On first access to a context in a session the default favourite for the context it is invoked. If there is no default favourite,  a system-wide default is invoked. On return to the context within a session,  the last parameters used are reapplied.
list.Name: isDefault

list.Description: The User who has this Favourite
list.Name: User

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Ministry ID for the Region
list.Name: ministryRegionID

list.Description: The name of the Region
list.Name: name

list.Description: The effective date of the Region - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The end date of the Region; null if active - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Ministry ID for the District
list.Name: ministryDistrictID

list.Description: The name of the District
list.Name: name

list.Description: The region in which the District is found.
list.Name: region

list.Description: The effective date of the District ID - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The end date of the District; null if active - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Ministry ID for the Service Area
list.Name: ministryServiceAreaID

list.Description: The name of the Service Area
list.Name: name

list.Description: The district in which the Service Area is found.
list.Name: district

list.Description: The effective date of the Service Area - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The end date of the Service Area; null if active - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: A list of School Districts in the Province of BC. Authoritative source to be determined.
list.Name: SchoolDistrict

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The full name of the School District
list.Name: name

list.Description: A short name for the School District useful in some areas of the UI. Usually with format \"SD 61\".
list.Name: shortName

list.Description: A list of cities in BC. Authoritative source to be determined.
list.Name: City

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the City
list.Name: name

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Information about the users of the system.
list.Name: User

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Security Manager User ID
list.Name: smUserId

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id

list.Description: Primary Key
list.Name: id
